data.name: BRUTAL JOHN
data.detailed_description:
BRUTAL JOHN is a fast-paced ultraviolent old school FPS that fuses together classic shooters like Duke Nukem, Serious Sam, Doom, Soldier of Fortune.

About Game :

Luzilian, the evil mutant, has captured the world using mining technologies. He is the main mining boss of the universe. Those who control mining - controls the world. And only one man can stop it - Brutal John.



The game takes place in 2090 - mining technologies were able to completely conquer the world, because of which the world was on the verge of disaster - the world's economy was destroyed, and the whole atmosphere was polluted with harmful emissions produced by all factories in the world in order to maintain a high mining hash rate.

Key Features :

  • True Old-School shooter, inspired by the best 90s shooters.
  • Crazy storyline. Save the world from mining.
  • Totally brutal aliens annihilation. Rip apart your enemies with various destructive weapons.
  • Insane boss fights: from crazy cooks and generals - to huge brain machines, and fatty aliens.
  • Destroy mining technologies.
  • Stylish Retro graphics.
  • Seek secrets and easter eggs.
  • Explore different locations: space stations, cities, wild west, caverns, casino, mining factories, etc.
  • Superior dynamically changing Old-School Soundtrack, by VM-Sound.

Developers :

  • Game is being made by THREE CRAZY simple dudes: Acetone Mutant, AStav and _DNV_.
    Each have 12+ years of gamedev experience and 24+ years of gaming experience, and we crunching like hell.
    Mad dudes, crazy crunchers, true gamers, true game developers.

data.short_description: BRUTAL JOHN is a fast-paced ultraviolent retro FPS combining crazy storyline about saving the world from the mining technlogies, with inspired gameplay from the best shooters of the '90s. Rip apart alien enemies, destroy mining technologies and save the world!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Now this is pretty fun. A Retro FPS about blowing up crypto. Lmao. Hell yeah.”
Gianni

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 Ghz of faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 / AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.5 Ghz of faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 Ghz of faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 / AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
